attributes.action: Make The Sun and the Daily Mail apologise for misrepresenting Hull 2017.
attributes.background: Today The Sun and The Daily Mail reported on City of Culture using random pictures of New Years Eve to represent what happened on 1st January. Not only were the pictures of NYE what would be expected in any city on that night, but it was implied that these were from the opening of City of Culture.

rejection.details:
You may wish to make a complaint to the Independent Press Standards Organisation (IPSO), which regulates the UK newspaper industry. You can find out more here:

https://www.ipso.co.uk/IPSO/makeacomplaint.html
